ygData.subject: Re: Guide on brewing- INT
ygData.msgSnippet: I havent started on Brewing yet, but soon. I suspect as with other skills Int counts..A LOT. I have a INT ring that increase INt by ..i think 2  or 4 point. i
ygData.messageBody:
I havent started on Brewing yet, but soon. I suspect as with other skills
Int counts..A LOT.

I have a INT ring that increase INt by ..i think 2 or 4 point. i put it on
during training skills like.. Safefall , Feigh Death and fighting (melee)
nasties and found that i get skills up faster. I have max out double wield ,
Feigh death, Mend, sense heading, punch etc using this "boozed" ring. Im
looking for more INT rings to up INT during training/Practice.

Rings r very useful. I got a "Charm" necklace and put it on during Buying
and selling stuff at Inns and shops from NPC. I pay about 1Sp -1gp lower
when buying and get 1sp -1gp more when selling.

Yiyang
